Room.Name: Draknal's Cove
Room.ShortDescription: You are under the Great Fighter's Hall, in Draknal's private chamber.
Room.LongDescription: Draknal the Death Knight was once a respected lord, serving in the services of King Lyanden. But he was responsible for a dark deed, and was found out by the council of mages. As punishment for breaking his knight's code, he has been cursed with afterlife as a knight of death. Unlike a mortal fighter, he possesses wonderful magical power in addition to being a great fighter. This is the chamber where he must spend eternity.
